/>
V.iii.6.2.g
.
Fatty Liver
Fatty liver, also called hepatic steatosis, is not a disability for which SC can be granted.  By itself it is simply considered an abnormal laboratory finding.
Reference
:  For more information on abnormal laboratory findings discovered in STRs without a claim, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, 3.C.1.d
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 6 - Digestive Disabilities
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 6, Section None
